# 2.1 Overview

In this chapter, you will be introduced to several ggplot extensions for creating more elegant and effective statistical graphics. By the end of this exercise, you will be able to:

-   control the placement of annotation on a graph by using functions provided in ggrepel package,

-   create professional publication quality figure by using functions provided in ggthemes and hrbrthemes packages,

-   plot composite figure by combining ggplot2 graphs by using patchwork packages.
